metadata.description: Average water levels for Swiss lakes that are in the Next Wave app. Only includes lakes where meteonews.ch provides water level data (Pegel).
metadata.displayFormat: Show difference in cm from average: '+15 cm' or '-8 cm'
metadata.notes: Average levels researched from BAFU historical data. For regulated lakes, uses the legally defined normal level. Lakes without water level data on meteonews.ch are marked as null.
